title: Linon Ervin Wood Square Drop Leaf Table in Black
features: Solid wood construction ensure years of use
Black finish coordinates with a variety of decor styles
Change the size of your table quickly and easy with dual 9 inch drop leaves
Expandable tabletop extends from 30 to 48 inches to fit a variety of spaces
description: Enjoy a delicious homemade dinner with family and friends over this contemporary wood dining table. Sleek and refined, the versatile 48 inch drop leaf design fits both large or small rooms. Fold each side down for a space saving rectangle thats perfect in a breakfast nook, dinette, kitchen corner, or against an office wall. Expertly crafted from solid rubberwood to ensure years of use, it features a stunning black finish that coordinates with both casual and sophisticated styles. From country farmhouse to urban loft, this piece will enhance any homes decor.Features :- Crafted from MDF and Rubberwood- Solid wood construction ensure years of use- Black finish coordinates with a variety of decor styles- Change the size of your table quickly and easy with dual 9 inch drop leaves- Expandable tabletop extends from 30 to 48 inches to fit a variety of spaces- Sturdy design holds up to 100 pounds- Perfect for small space living with dimensions of 48l x 30w x 30h- Assembly is simple with included easy-to-follow instructions..Specifications :- Assembly Required : Some Assembly Required- Product Dimensions : 48"w x 30"d x 30"h- Product Weight : 44 lbs- Weight Capacity : 100 lbs.
